sent.orig: It turns out that 0.0 is included in the output of Math.random.
sent.trans: 当然，最后的结果是在Math.random的输出中包括了0.0。

sent.orig: It is generalize the known results by J. Yah (Proc. Amer. Math. Soc. 98 (1986) 276-282).
Other useful constructors, methods, and constants are predefined in the classes Float, Double, and Math.
sent.trans: 其他有用的构造函数，方法和常数在类Float和Double以及Math中定义。

sent.orig: The students who take SAT Math, AMC and AIME are highly recommended to attend Math Club.
sent.trans: 我们建议上SAT数学、AMC和AIME课程的学生最好参加数学俱乐部。
